description: This is a static Rs 1000 monthly plan
This is a static Rs 99 monthly plan

This is a dynamic Rs 99 monthly plan which has conditional offer attached to it. Your monthly rental will be ₹49 for up to 100 payments, ₹39 for up to 200 payments, ₹29 for up to 300 payments, and just Rs 19 if you exceed 300 payments.
This is a lifetime plan of Rs 1999. Merchant pays Rs 1999 upfront and no further deductions happen
